import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Modal, Form, FloatingLabel } from 'react-bootstrap' const Edit = (props) => { const service = props.editservice const [availability, setAvailability] = useState(service.availability) const [loading, setLoading] = useState() function handleSave(e) { e.preventDefault() console.log(availability) } return ( <> Edit Service
setAvailability(e.target.value)} />
) } export default Edit
